thread.title: Poisoned umbrellas and tea - fates of Kremlin foes

title: Poisoned umbrellas and tea - fates of Kremlin foes
text:
Poisoned umbrellas and tea - fates of Kremlin foes Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 02:16 
Britain has warned of a robust response if it finds evidence of Russian involvement in the collapse of a former Russian agent convicted of betraying dozens of spies to British intelligence. But it's not the first time critics or enemies of Moscow have been victims of poisoning or suspected poisoning. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Britain has warned of a robust response if it finds evidence of Russian involvement in the collapse of a former Russian agent convicted of betraying dozens of spies to British intelligence. But it's not the first time critics or enemies of Moscow have been victims of poisoning or suspected poisoning.
